title: Senior Vue Developer
description: We are seeking an experienced Vue.js developer to join our Copenhagen team. You will be working on high-traffic web applications and collaborating closely with our UX designers and backend engineers.

company.name: NordTech ApS
company.description: NordTech is a Danish software consultancy that focuses on building scalable web applications for both startups and established enterprises. We offer flexible work hours and a great office culture.

title: Front-End Engineer (Vue)
description: Join our front-end team in Aarhus to create responsive, accessible user interfaces. We’re looking for someone with strong Vue and UI/UX skills, who loves clean design and pixel perfection.

company.name: Designhuset ApS
company.description: Designhuset is a digital agency based in Aarhus with a focus on creative design and front-end development. We work with a variety of Danish brands on modern web solutions.

title: Vue.js Developer
description: Do you love front-end technologies and Vue.js? We’re looking for a developer to join our fast-paced team working on e-commerce platforms and internal tools.

company.name: EcomLoop A/S
company.description: EcomLoop is a leading e-commerce development company based in Odense. We specialize in helping Danish retailers build scalable and performant online stores.

title: Vue Front-End Developer
description: We are hiring a part-time Vue.js developer in Aalborg. Perfect for students or freelancers who want to work on fun projects and build a portfolio while studying.

company.name: NovaDigital
company.description: NovaDigital is a creative tech studio in Aalborg focused on helping local businesses digitize their services. We value creativity, flexibility, and good vibes.

title: Full Stack Vue Developer
description: We’re looking for a Full Stack Developer with strong Vue.js experience and basic Laravel knowledge to help us maintain and grow our logistics platform.

company.name: FreightSoft A/S
company.description: FreightSoft builds web-based logistics and shipment platforms for Danish freight companies. Our team in Esbjerg is growing, and we need you on board!

title: Vue Native Developer
description: Are you passionate about mobile development? Join our Roskilde team to build cross-platform mobile apps using Vue Native for both Android and iOS.

company.name: AppByen ApS
company.description: AppByen is a mobile-first development studio in Roskilde helping companies transition into the app world. We value clean code, good design, and a great work/life balance.
